title: CRAWFORD ASSCHER CUT EARRINGS, GOLD
description: Our go-to oversized statement earrings, the Crawford, is an update to the Yves earring. Round lab-grown white sapphires of various sizes surround a 2 carat asscher cut lab-grown sapphire center stone and secured with a french back.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold-coated brass
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round and asscher cut
Closure: French backing



5.84 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
